    • 构造器详细资料

      • MealTimeProvider

        public MealTimeProvider(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.MealTime>[]> aMealTimes)
        Return a new MealTimeProvider.
        参数:
        aMealTimes - ArrayList of ArrayList of MealTimes. First index is type, second is weekday, where 0 is Sunday

    • 方法详细资料

      • swapType

        public com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime swapType(com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime m,
                                                 int type)
        Given a DatedMealTime, return another one of the same but different type.
        参数:
        m - DatedMealTime to convert
        type - Type to convert to
        返回:
        A new DatedMealTime with the given type, or null if it does not exist

      • isCurrentMeal

        public boolean isCurrentMeal(com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime dmt,
                    int type)
        Checks if the given DatedMealTime is the current meal for the given type.
        参数:
        dmt - Meal to check
        type - Type to check against
        返回:
        If the given meal is the current meal of the given type

      • getCurrentMeal

        public com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime getCurrentMeal(int type)
        Returns the current meal of the given type.
        参数:
        type - Meal type to return
        返回:
        A DatedMealTime of the current meal

      • getNextMeal

        public com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime getNextMeal(int type,
                                                    com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime meal)
        Find the next meal.
        参数:
        type - Meal type to search for
        meal - Starting meal
        返回:
        The meal following the given one

      • getPreviousMeal

        public com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime getPreviousMeal(int type,
                                                        com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime meal)
        Find the previous meal.
        参数:
        type - Meal type to search for
        meal - Starting meal
        返回:
        The meal preceding the given one

      • currentMealStatus

        public static int currentMealStatus(com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime meal)
        Check to see what the current time is relative to the given meal.
        参数:
        meal - Meal to check against
        返回:
        1 if we are in the given meal
        0 if we are after the meal
        -1 if we are before the meal

      • getDaysMeals

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime> getDaysMeals(int type,
                                                                          com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.Date date)
        Return a list of the day's meals.
        参数:
        type - Meal type
        date - Which day's meals to return
        返回:
        An ArrayList of the day's DatedMealTimes, which could be empty

      • getDaysMealNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDaysMealNames(int type,
                                                     int dow)
        Return a list of the day's meal names. It is intended to be more efficient than calling getDaysMeals and extracting the meal names manually.
        参数:
        type - Meal type
        dow - Day of week's list to return (0 = Sunday)
        返回:
        An ArrayList of the day's meal names, which could be empty

      • constructMeal

        public com.sleepykoala.pmeals.data.DatedMealTime constructMeal(java.lang.String mealName,
                                                      java.lang.String date,
                                                      int type)
        Given a meal name, a date, and a type, return the unique DatedMealTime that has those properties, or null.
        参数:
        mealName - Meal name
        date - Date
        type - Meal type
        返回:
        The unique DatedMealTime that has the given properties, or null
